alert.note: Alert for Southern Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 9:15PM CST until December 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph possible. * WHERE...Coastal portions of southeast Louisiana and southern Mississippi from Terrebonne Parish through Hancock County and along the shores of Lake Pontchartrain and Maurepas. * WHEN...Through noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Sudden gusts could result in difficult driving conditions, especially on elevated roadways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
